Translations.Text: Baluna [1], ‘amara prati ohi nayila hayeche ye, jinadera [2] ekati dala manoyogera sathe suneche [3] atahpara baleche, ‘amara to eka bismayakara kura'ana sunechi
ya satyera dike hedayata kare; phale amara ete imana enechi. Ara amara kakhano amadera rabera sathe ka'uke sarika karaba na
ara niscaya'i amadera rabera maryada samucca [1]; tini grahana karenani kono sangini ebam na kona santana
E'o ye, amadera madhyakara nirbodhera allah sambandhe khuba'i abantara ukti karata
Athaca amara mane karatama manusa ebam jina allah samparke kakhano mithya balabe na
E'o ye, kichu kichu manusa kichu jinera asraya nita, phale tara jinadera atmambharita bariye diyechila [1].’
‘E'o ye, tara dharana karechila yemana tomara dharana kara [1] ye, allah ka'uke'o kakhano punaruthita karabena na [2].’
‘E'o ye, amara ceyechilama akasera tathya sangraha karate kintu amara dekhate pelama kathora prahari o ulkapinda dbara akasa paripurna
‘e'o ye, amara age akasera bibhinna ghamtite sambada sunara jan'ya basatama [1]; kintu ekhana ke'u sambada sunate ca'ile se tara upara niksepera jan'ya prastuta jalanta ulkapindera sam'mukhina haya
‘E'o ye, amara jani na yaminera adhibasidera amangala'i abhipraeta, na tadera raba tadera mangala cana
‘E'o ye, amadera kichu sankhyaka satkarmaparayana ebam kichu sankhyaka era byatikrama, amara chilama bibhinna pathera anusari
e'o ye, amara bujhechi, amara yamine allahke parabhuta karate paraba na ebam paliye'o tamke byartha karate paraba na
E'o ye, amara yakhana hidayatera bani sunalama tate imana analama. Sutaram ye byakti tara rabera prati imana ane tara kono ksati o kono an'yayera asanka thakabe na [1].’
‘E'o ye, amadera madhye kichu sankhyaka ache musalima ara kichu sankhyaka ache simalanghanakari; atahpara yara isalama grahana kareche tara sucintitabhabe satya patha beche niyeche
‘Ara yara simalanghanakari tara to hayeche jahannamera indhana.’
Ara tara yadi satya pathe pratisthita thakata tabe abasya'i taderake amara pracura bari barsane sikta karatama
Ya dbara amara taderake pariksa karate pari. Ara ye byakti tara rabera smarana hate bimukha haya tini take duhsaha sastite prabesa karabena
Ara niscaya masajidasamuha allahara'i jan'ya. Kaje'i allahra sathe tomara an'ya ka'uke deko na
Ara niscaya yakhana allahara banda [1] tamke dakara jan'ya damrala, takhana tara tara kache bhira jamala
Baluna, ‘ami to kebala amara rabake'i daki ebam tamra sange ka'uke'o sarika kari na.’
Baluna, ‘niscaya ami tomadera kono ksati ba kalyanera malika na'i’
baluna, ‘allahra pakara'o hate ke'u'i amake raksa karate parabe na ebam allah chara ami kakhana'o kono asraya paba na

‘sudhu allahara paksa theke paumchano ebam tamra risalatera bani pracara'i amara dayitba. Ara ye-ke'u allah o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare tara jan'ya rayeche jahannamera aguna, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe [1].’
Abasese yakhana tara ya pratisruta ta pratyaksa karabe, takhana tara janate parabe ke sahayyakari hisebe adhikatara durbala ebam sankhyaya sbalpa
Baluna, ‘ami jani na tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta ki asanna, na amara rabera jan'ya kono dirgha meyada sthira karabena.’
Tini'i gayebi bisayera jnani, tini tamra gayebera jnana kara'o kache prakasa karena na
tamra manonita rasula chara. Se ksetre allah tamra rasulera samane ebam pichane prahari niyojita karena

yate tini prakasa karena ye, abasya'i tara tadera rabera risalata pauche diyechena [1]. Ara tadera kache ya ache ta tini jnane paribestana kare rekhechena ebam tini pratiti bastu ganana kare hiseba rekhechena
He bastraabrta
rate salate damrana [1], kichu ansa chara
adha-rata ba tara ceye'o kichu kama
Athaba tara ceye'o ekatu barana. Ara kura'ana tila'oyata karuna dhire dhire suspastabhabe
niscaya amara apanara prati nayila karachi gurubhara bani
Niscaya ratera belara utha [1] prabrtti dalane prabalatara [2] ebam bakasphurane adhika upayogi
Niscaya dinera belaya apanara jan'ya rayeche dirgha karmabyastata
Ara apani apanara rabera nama smarana karuna ebam tamra prati magna hona ekanisthabhabe
Tini purba o pascimera raba, tini chara kono satya ilah ne'i. Ata'eba, takemi apani grahana karuna karmabidhayakarupe
Ara loke ya bale, tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam saujan'yera sathe taderake parihara kare caluna
Ara chere dina amake o bilasa samagrira adhikari mithyaropakariderake [1] ebam kichu kalera jan'ya taderake abakasa dina
niscaya amadera kache ache srnkhalasamuha o prajbalita aguna
ara ache emana khadya ya galaya atake yaya ebam yantranadayaka sasti
Sedina yamina o parbatamala prakampita habe ebam parbatasamuha biksipta bahamana balukarasite parinata habe
Niscaya amara tomadera kache pathiyechi eka rasula tomadera jan'ya saksisbarupa yemana rasula pathiyechilama phira‘a'unera kache
kintu phira‘a'una se rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale amara take atyanta saktabhabe pakara'o karechilama
Ata'eba, yadi tomara kuphari kara, tabe ki kare antaraksa karabe sedina ye dinati kisoraderake parinata karabe brd'dhe
sedina asamana habe bidirna [1]. Tamra pratisruti abasya'i bastabayita habe
Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye caya se tara rabera dike patha abalambana karuka
